main.title: My Addresses
createNewAddress.areYouSure: Do you want to create a new address?
createNewAddress.cancelled: Action cancelled - did not create new address
updateDefaultAddress.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to switch %1$s to be your new default address?
updateDefaultAddress.cancelled: Action cancelled, did not switch default address.
updateDefaultAddress.success: Switched %1$s to be new default address.
status.usedCachedAddress: Could not connect to NodeCore, showing cached values. This does not show recent changes!
backup_prompt1: You've changed the wallet by adding new address %1$s.
hideZero_addNew_warning:
Currently '%1$s' is enabled, so the new address would be hidden.
This will unhide all zero-balance addresses so the new address will show up.
